Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near Garfield/Aberdeen
ShortDescription: Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Halsted, 51st, Racine and Garfield, due to fire department activity near Garfield/Aberdeen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Halsted, 51st, Racine and Garfield, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near Garfield/Aberdeen.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
